Revision rhinoplasty.context: Revision rhinoplasty and left conchal cartilage harvest to correct nasal deformity.

left conchal cartilage harvest.context: Revision rhinoplasty and left conchal cartilage harvest to correct nasal deformity.

nasal deformity.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Nasal deformity, status post rhinoplasty.

status post rhinoplasty.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Nasal deformity, status post rhinoplasty.

saddle-nose deformity.context: During his healing, perioperatively he did sustain a hockey puck to the nose resulting in a saddle-nose deformity with septal hematoma.

septal hematoma.context: During his healing, perioperatively he did sustain a hockey puck to the nose resulting in a saddle-nose deformity with septal hematoma.

Lidocaine with epinephrine.context: The patient did have approximately 12 mL of Lidocaine with epinephrine 1% with 1:100,000 infiltrated into the nasal soft tissues.

cocaine pledgets.context: In addition to this, cocaine pledgets were placed to assist with hemostasis.

broad lower lateral cartilages.context: The patient did have very broad lower lateral cartilages leading to a bulbous tip.

bulbous tip.context: The patient did have very broad lower lateral cartilages leading to a bulbous tip.

Gore-Tex small implant.context: A Gore-Tex small implant had been selected, previously incised.

hemostasis.context: The patient was examined for hemostasis.

no evidence of hematoma.context: There was no evidence of hematoma, and the patient had a series of brown Steri-Strips and Aquaplast cast placed over the nasal dorsum.

antibiotics.context: He was charged to home on antibiotics to prevent infection both from the left ear conchal cartilage harvest and also the Gore-Tex implant area.
